Amazing work you're doing there ! If you need a hand with structuring this =
thing, perhaps we can buy a new domain and put a nice structure into it so =
it's more easy to navigate ?

Let me know if you need any help with this..
=

And thanks for the effort you put into this project !

Dave

--- In nihont=
ostudy@yahoogroups.com, "Dean" <dshartley3@...> wrote:
>
> I'm improving th=
e Col Dean Hartley Website, specifically the page on the 1964 Barnsdall Swo=
rd Show put on by the Nanka Token Kai (http://home.comcast.net/~colhartley/=
Oriental/ArmsAndArmor.htm).  I am looking for additional photos of the exhi=
bit itself (the catalog pictures are already on the page).  Fred Martin and=
 Bob Haynes just about killed themselves putting on a fantastic show and I =
want it to remain possible for those who weren't there to enjoy it.
